|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Intel;WG82583V; |eth2chip = Intel;WG82583V; |eth3chip = Intel;WG82583V; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1A:8C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = American Megatrends;Bios;080015; |stockos = Linux;3.12.48;UTM 9.4;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, SATA, CompactFlash |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (38400 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VGA out, RTC w/ battery, metal case, power switch, heat sink, buzzer |addchip = LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;NCT6775F;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, Bus Termination Regulator;Winbond;W8331DG;;1;,,, 3-State Quad Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;74LVC125A;;1;,,, 2Kb SPI Serial EEPROM;ON Semiconductor;CAT25020;;4;,,, Intel I/O Controller Hub 8 Mobile;Intel;DW82801HBM;;1;,,, 4A 1MHz Synchronous Buck Regulator;Renesas;ISL8014A;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;Texas Instruments;SN74LS14;;1;,,, 64-pin CK505 for Desktop Systems;Renesas;ICS9LP505-1;;1;,,, 30V 58A N-Channel MOSFET;ON Semiconductor;FDD8880;;2;,,, 5A Adjustable LDO Regulator;Niko Semiconductor;L1084DG;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;National Semiconductor;LM358M;;1;,,, 30V 8A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4411;;2;,,, 5V or 12V Single Synchronous Buck PWM Controller;Renesas;ISL6545;;3;,,, 2A 2V Non-Synchronous Buck Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS54231;;1;,,, 30V 10.5A N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;6;,,, Integrated 4A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3842;;2;,,, Integrated 12A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3840;;2;,,, 25V 75A N-Channel Logic Level Mode FET;Niko Semiconductor;P75N02LDG;;1;,,, 6 Channel Bipolar Buffer w/Open-Collector Output;Texas Instruments;SN7407;;1;,,, 7-Bit Programmable Single-Phase Synchronous Buck Controller;ON Semiconductor;ADP3211A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none

|availability = EoL |eoldate = 06/30/2018 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0096KC88M |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Atom]]'' (@1.66GHz) *Memory: 2GB DDR2 (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 1MB SPI Serial Flash :CompactFlash Port :2x SATA ports w/320GB SATA Disk *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3.33A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Sophos UTM110 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Sophos UTM110 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
